name: Tracy Shepard
text: Great prices, wonderful service!

name: james hamsting
text: Very positive experience with this company. the staff is very professional and experienced. I will definitely use this company in the future for used forklift trucks for sale. I love this company. Thank you so much.

name: jolly hanrics
text: One of the best forklift parts company. wonderful experience. Southern Lift Trucks is a great company to deal with. I highly recommend them for all of your forklift needs.

name: Porter Grey
text: very pleasant experience with Southern Lift Trucks. This is one of the best forklift truck rental company . They are knowledgeable, professional and patient. I highly recommend them to anyone.

name: jack sting
text: I used Southern Lift Trucks company forklift truck rental service . They have very nice service . They are knowledgeable, professional and patient. I highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Butch W.
text: It's great

name: Penelope Pollard
text: Pleasant people working here.

name: Howard Moore
text: Great Service! Great people! AAA Moving is very pleased with the service we  received from Dyna-Lift

name: Joel Land
text: Very nice and helpful. Highly recommend.

name: Joe
text: Great company to deal with. They brought me a fork lift to rent and fixed my forklift for much less then any company in the area.

name: Allen Littlefield
text: Great place to rent equipment

name: Patrick Ingraham
text: Nice folks.

name: Krzysztof Sawicki
text: Fast unloading

name: Jason Smith
text: Very friendly

name: Randy Cooley
text: Great place. All the mechanics are very friendly and will show you what you need to know about the equipment. If you have attachments that are for another piece of equipment of same. They will configure something that will work and looks professionally done and not have wires running or hanging loose.

name: James Boyd
text: Great staff and quality products

name: Montrell Miller
text: Clean and organized store. Staff was cordial but not passionate about products.

name: Ollie Lee
text: Always treat ALDOT good

name: Charles Barnes
text: Great , people were nice and polite

name: Earnest Gann
text: Great staff, quality products and service

name: Robert Hill
text:
I had a great experience! Greg is an excellent serviceman. We needed a time sensitive fix on our forklift.

Greg checked out the issue and told me he would be there to fix it the next day bright and early. Sure enough, he was there waiting on me at our warehouse right at 8am. He fixed the issue, got our forklift repaired in time, and helped us win business.

resp.text: Fantastic, Robert!  We appreciate the feedback and we appreciate you!

name: rollie Ollie
text: Good morning!! My name is Roosevelt Woods,an associate at Coleman Russell warehouse. We have been experiencing our forklift not cranking. We have had multiple mechanics whoworked and labored to fix the problem!! Today, Greg a Springer mechanic,cane out and fixed our problem. Thanks Greg he's the best.

resp.text: Great news, Rollie!  We appreciate the kind words - Greg is one of our best technicians and a great addition to our team!

name: Charlie “Red”
text: Took 3 days come out. Ordered parts still not back a week later

name: Dwayne Seppala
text: pick up a load of forklifts the staff here was great hope to see yall again

name: Matt Gray
text: If you need a forklift or any type of material handling solution look no further than Springer Equipment Company. The Springer team is 5 stars + and they will get your products out the door with great efficiency! This is the only call you need to make to buy a forklift or repair the ones you have!

name: Rab Stewart
text: These people know forklifts and they know GREAT customer service. I've purchased several forklifts from Springer. The sales and maintenance department are top notch.

name: Jacob Waldrop
text: Great place to work

name: Kevin Wynn
text: Fantastic company. Cut my teeth in parts and service. The training and help I received led me to where I’m at today. I can honestly say there is not a better forklift company in the state. Family owned and customer oriented. I would strongly recommend them for any of your forklift parts or service needs. Also Jordan S. Is the best Rental guy in the state!

name: Laura Johansen
text: My boss purchased a Ekko stacker from them a few months back and it has made my job a breeze thank you Steve.

name: Trevor Mills
text: Springer sold me a Toyota forklift that was not what was represented on the quote when they delivered it. Since I was out of state they decided to say too bad. I also had $690 of repair bills to get it running properly in the first 2 weeks of owning it.

name: John Higginbotham
text: First Contact: Terrible attitude. The gentleman handling my request (Randy), acted like he was doing me a favor. Attitude was terrible; a true SALES PREVENTION department. Update: Was contacted by what seemed to be the business owner or manager, and was assured that this was not acceptable. I give this 3 more stars simply because many owners do not reach out to make things "right" with customers with a bad experience.

name: Hammer Man
text: Good service. They provide propane for my company. Thank you!

name: Robert Cardwell
text: Poor service.  Even worse follow up.

resp.text: Hi, Robert - yikes!  We're disappointed to see your review and sure hope to resolve any issues or situation that caused a bad experience for you.  May we connect today to find a solution?

name: Larry Edington
text: A quality supplier of material handling equipment.

name: Steve Cohen
text: Great folks!

name: Larissa Hensley
text: Love it

name: John Jackson
text:
You guys and girls are AWSOME !!!
THANKS FOR THE GREAT WORK.

name: Michelle G
text: I needed to have a valve replaced just before Thanksgiving. The assistant verified some information for me then called me back, just as she said she would. The mechanic replaced the valve and all parties were very pleasant.

name: Wild Hunter
text: Poor mechanics

resp.text: Mr Roulaine,  I would like to know the specifics of your visit, so I can make changes so this doesn't happen again.  Thank you for your help.  Ashville Forklift

name: john lee
text: Quick service
